name: Harland's Garden [traditional] 2oz.
description:
My well respected, late grandfather had been known to, while gardening, stand up tall, wipe the sweat from his brow, reach in his back pocket, and pull out some form of portable beef.  Whether is was summer sausage or beef jerky, it was the only thing to satisfy a German gardener's appetite.  This classic blend of spices is a salute to Harland and his love of gardening... and beef. 

*organic grass-fed beef, black pepper, garlic powder, organic cane sugar, sea salt

name: [greek] 2oz.
description: *organic grass-fed beef, cracked black pepper, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, cumin, lemon peel, organic cane sugar, sea salt

name: [spicy] 2oz.
description:
Several products labeled 'spicy' play it safe and give you a mild, bland version of the the word.  Don't expect a safe version of spicy here.  It says spicy so you should expect the same.  I wouldn't put it in the category of 'flamin' hot' but more along the lines of 'just right'.  

*organic grass-fed beef, black pepper, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, organic cane sugar, sea salt
